name: Bench Press (Dumbbell)
short: Press dumbbells from chest to full extension, feet planted.
steps: Lie flat on bench, feet planted. Bring dumbbells down to mid-chest.
Keep elbows at ~45째 angle (not flared too wide). Press up fully, squeezing chest.
Control both down & up motion for maximum effectiveness.

name: Shoulder Press (Dumbbell)
short: Press dumbbells overhead, keep core braced and avoid arching.
steps: Seated or standing, dumbbells at shoulder level. Keep core tight.
Press straight overhead with full range of motion.
Lower with control, don't let elbows drop below shoulder level.

name: Dumbbell Fly
short: Arc dumbbells out and together, focusing on chest stretch and squeeze.
steps: Lie on bench, dumbbells above chest with slight elbow bend.
Lower weights in wide arc until you feel chest stretch.
Bring dumbbells together above chest, squeezing pecs.

name: Lateral Raises
short: Raise dumbbells out to sides until parallel with ground.
steps: Stand with dumbbells at sides, slight bend in elbows.
Raise weights out to sides until parallel with ground.
Lower with control, don't swing or use momentum.

name: Tricep Dips (Bench)
short: Lower body using triceps, keep elbows close to body.
steps: Sit on bench edge, hands gripping beside hips, legs extended.
Lower body by bending elbows, keep them close to sides.
Push back up using triceps, don't go too low to avoid shoulder strain.

name: Overhead Tricep Extension
short: Lower dumbbell behind head, extend back up using triceps.
steps: Hold dumbbell overhead with both hands, elbows pointing forward.
Lower weight behind head by bending elbows, keep upper arms still.
Extend back to start position, focus on tricep contraction.

name: Goblet Squat
short: Hold dumbbell at chest, squat deep keeping chest up.
steps: Hold dumbbell at chest, feet slightly wider than hip.
Squat down with good depth, knees tracking over toes.
Drive up through heels, maintain upright chest position.

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
short: Rear foot elevated, lunge down on front leg.
steps: Rear foot on bench, front foot forward in lunge position.
Drop down until front thigh ~parallel to ground.
Push up through front heel, focus weight on front leg.

name: Glute Bridge (Weighted)
short: Bridge hips up with weight, squeeze glutes at top.
steps: Lie on back, knees bent, weight on hips/lower abdomen.
Drive through heels, lift hips up squeezing glutes.
Hold briefly at top, lower with control.

name: Calf Raises
short: Rise up on toes, squeeze calves at top.
steps: Stand with balls of feet on elevated surface, heels hanging.
Rise up on toes as high as possible, squeeze calves.
Lower heels below platform level for full stretch.

name: Plank Variations
short: Hold plank position, maintain straight body line.
steps: Start in plank position, body straight from head to heels.
Engage core, don't let hips sag or pike up.
Hold for time or add variations like shoulder taps.

name: Russian Twists
short: Rotate torso side to side while holding weight.
steps: Sit with knees bent, lean back slightly, hold weight at chest.
Rotate torso left and right, touching weight to ground beside hips.
Keep feet off ground for added difficulty, control the movement.

name: Single Arm Row (Dumbbell)
short: Support one knee/hand on bench, row dumbbell to your hip.
steps: One knee & hand on bench, other foot on ground. Back flat & parallel.
Pull dumbbell so elbow goes back past torso, squeeze shoulder blades.
Lower slowly with control, maintain flat back position.

name: Reverse Fly (Dumbbell)
short: Bend forward, fly weights back squeezing shoulder blades.
steps: Bend forward at hips, dumbbells hanging below chest.
Raise weights out to sides, squeezing shoulder blades together.
Focus on rear delts, don't use momentum.

name: Hammer Curl
short: Curl with neutral grip, thumbs pointing up.
steps: Hold dumbbells with neutral grip, thumbs pointing up.
Curl weights up keeping wrists straight, elbows at sides.
Lower with control, don't swing or use momentum.

name: Concentration Curl
short: Seated, elbow braced on thigh, curl with strict form.
steps: Sit on bench, brace elbow against inner thigh.
Curl dumbbell up with strict form, focus on bicep contraction.
Lower slowly, don't let weight rest at bottom.

name: Face Pull (Band)
short: Pull band to face level, separate hands at end.
steps: Attach band at chest height, grab with overhand grip.
Pull band to face level, elbows high.
Separate hands at face, squeeze shoulder blades together.

name: Farmer's Carry
short: Carry heavy dumbbells with neutral grip, walk upright.
steps: Pick up heavy dumbbells with straight back.
Stand tall and walk with controlled steps.
Keep shoulders down, core braced, don't lean forward.

name: Incline Bench Press (Dumbbell)
short: Incline bench press to target upper chest and front delts.
steps: Set bench at 30-45째, lie back with dumbbells at chest.
Press up and slightly together, focus on upper chest.
Lower with control, feel stretch in upper chest.

name: Dumbbell Curl
short: Keep elbows by your sides, curl weights with control.
steps: Stand tall, dumbbells at sides. Elbows stay pinned to sides.
Move only forearms, curl weights up by contracting biceps.
Control both raising & lowering phases for maximum effectiveness.

name: Lateral Lunges
short: Step wide to side, sit back into lunge position.
steps: Stand with feet together, step wide to one side.
Sit back into lunge, keep other leg straight.
Push off to return to center, alternate sides.

name: Push-ups (Weighted/Elevated)
short: Lower chest to ground, push back up with control.
steps: Start in plank position, hands slightly wider than shoulders.
Lower chest to ground, keep body straight.
Push back up, fully extend arms at top.

name: Squat to Press (Dumbbell)
short: Squat down, drive up and press weights overhead.
steps: Hold dumbbells at shoulder level, feet shoulder-width apart.
Squat down keeping chest up, weights at shoulders.
Drive up explosively and press weights overhead.

name: Plank with Shoulder Tap
short: High plank, tap opposite shoulder while keeping hips stable.
steps: Start in high plank, body straight from head to heels.
Lift right hand to tap left shoulder, place it back.
Alternate while minimizing hip rotation and movement.

name: Arnold Press (Dumbbell)
short: Rotate dumbbells while pressing overhead.
steps: Start with dumbbells at chest, palms facing you.
Rotate and press up, palms face forward at top.
Reverse the motion on the way down.

name: Front Raises
short: Raise dumbbells forward to shoulder height.
steps: Hold dumbbells at sides, palms facing back.
Raise one or both weights forward to shoulder height.
Lower with control, don't swing or use momentum.

name: Skull Crushers (Dumbbell)
short: Lower weights to forehead, extend back up using triceps.
steps: Lie on bench, hold dumbbells above chest, arms extended.
Lower weights toward forehead by bending elbows only.
Extend back to start, keep upper arms stationary.

name: Diamond Push-ups
short: Push-ups with hands in diamond shape, targets triceps.
steps: Form diamond with hands, thumbs and index fingers touching.
Lower chest toward hands, keep elbows close to body.
Push back up, focus on tricep engagement.

name: Side Plank
short: Hold side plank position, body in straight line.
steps: Lie on side, prop up on forearm, stack feet.
Lift hips up, body in straight line from head to feet.
Hold position, keep core engaged, don't let hips sag.

name: Hanging Leg Raises
short: Hang from bar, raise legs up using core strength.
steps: Hang from pull-up bar with straight arms.
Raise legs up toward chest, keep them straight or bent.
Lower with control, don't swing or use momentum.

name: Bicep Curl + Press Combo
short: Curl weights up, then press overhead in one fluid motion.
steps: Start with dumbbells at sides, curl up to shoulders.
Rotate palms forward, press weights overhead.
Reverse the motion: lower to shoulders, then to sides.

name: Tricep Kickbacks
short: Bend forward, extend dumbbells back using triceps.
steps: Bend forward, upper arms parallel to ground, elbows bent.
Extend dumbbells back until arms are straight.
Squeeze triceps at top, return to bent position.

name: Mountain Climbers
short: Plank position, alternate bringing knees to chest rapidly.
steps: Start in plank position, hands under shoulders.
Alternate bringing knees toward chest rapidly.
Keep core tight, maintain plank position throughout.

name: Barbell Bench Press
short: Press barbell from chest to full extension, maintain arch.
steps: Lie on bench, grip barbell slightly wider than shoulders.
Lower bar to chest with control, elbows at 45째 angle.
Press up explosively, lock out arms at top.

name: Cable Tricep Pushdown
short: Push cable bar down, extend arms fully using triceps.
steps: Stand at cable machine, grab bar with overhand grip.
Keep elbows at sides, push bar down until arms straight.
Return with control, don't let elbows flare out.

name: Seated Cable Row (Wide Grip)
short: Pull cable handle to torso with wide grip, squeeze shoulder blades.
steps: Sit at cable machine, grab wide grip handle.
Pull handle to lower chest, squeeze shoulder blades together.
Return with control, feel stretch in lats.

name: Cable Crunch (Kneeling)
short: Kneel and crunch down using cable resistance.
steps: Kneel in front of cable machine, hold rope attachment.
Crunch down bringing elbows toward knees.
Focus on abs contraction, return with control.

name: Romanian Deadlift
short: Hinge at hips with slight knee bend, feel hamstring stretch.
steps: Hold dumbbells in front, hinge at hips with slight knee bend.
Lower weights along legs, feel stretch in hamstrings.
Drive hips forward to return, squeeze glutes at top.

name: Standing Calf Raises
short: Rise up on toes, squeeze calves at top.
steps: Stand with balls of feet on platform, heels hanging.
Rise up on toes as high as possible, squeeze calves.
Lower heels below platform for full stretch.

name: Hanging Knee Raise
short: Hang from bar, bring knees to chest using core.
steps: Hang from pull-up bar with straight arms.
Bring knees up toward chest, control the movement.
Lower legs with control, don't swing.

name: Incline Barbell Press
short: Press barbell on incline bench to target upper chest.
steps: Set bench at 30-45째, grip barbell slightly wider than shoulders.
Lower bar to upper chest with control.
Press up focusing on upper chest contraction.

name: Chest Fly (Dumbbell, Flat Bench)
short: Arc dumbbells out and together on flat bench.
steps: Lie flat on bench, dumbbells above chest with slight elbow bend.
Lower weights in wide arc until you feel chest stretch.
Bring dumbbells together above chest, squeeze pecs.

name: Overhead Cable Tricep Extension
short: Pull cable overhead, extend arms using triceps.
steps: Face away from cable machine, hold rope overhead.
Extend arms forward and up, focus on tricep contraction.
Return with control, keep upper arms stationary.
